def is_remote_control_within_reach(remote:item):
    # Check if the remote control is close to the character
    symbol close_to_remote=close_char(char, remote)
    return close_to_remote

behavior approach_remote_control(remote:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        # Approach the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_control_within_reach(remote
):
            # If the remote control is identified and close to the character, approach it
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and is_remote_control_within_reach(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)

        else:
            # If the remote control isnt identified, locate it by checking all unvisited items
            foreach remote: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                    observe(remote, "Where is the TV remote control")

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Temporarily hold the remote control to operate it

        achieve is_on(tv)
        # Ensure that the TV is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and is_off(remote_control)
        # Bind the identified remote control that is off

        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        # Bind an available TV instance

        turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control, tv)
        # Invoke the behavior to turn on the TV using the remote
